price: 27. Waxaase waari abadki Wejiga (Alle) Rabbigaa Haybadda iyo Sharafta Badan.
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
